document.text:
From: "" 
To:'
Subject: Fwd: Attending the Upcoming Maxwell Trial 
Date: Fri, 08 Oct 2021 20:49:10 +0000 
Inline-Images: Outlook-NCVBA.png 
Having some struggles with email on my phone still, but looks like I  also forwarded his second email, in May. 
Those two that I  sent along are the only communications I have from him. 
Sent from my iPhone 
Begin forwarded message: 
From: ")" <O=EXCHANGELABS/OU=EXCHANGE ADMINISTRATIVE 
BOHF23SPDLTYCN=RECIPIENTS/CN=D0812B3F0D874F78AF13D43961863FE4-
Date: May 10, 2021 at 13:34:00 PDT 
Subject: FW: Attending the Upcoming Maxwell Trial 
Hey 
team, similar email as what I got from him on April 20, just FYI. 
From: Robert Y. Lewis 
Sent: Monday, May 10, 2021 16:27 
To: 
I e> 
Subject: Attending the Upcoming Maxwell Trial 
Dear 
I represent one of the victims of Jeffrey Epstein and his lieutenant Ghislaine Maxwell. 
would like to attend the upcoming trial of Ms. Maxwell. She will be coming from England, 
where she lives. 
s not asking the government to pay for any travel expenses, but would like to be given priority 
(along with other victims of course) in getting into the trial as a spectator. Given the keen public interest in 
the case, she is afraid that without priority she will not be able to get into the courtroom. Would you let us 
know what your office is doing to ensure that victims like scan attend the trial? 
Thank you for all your hard work in bringing Ms. Maxwell to justice. 
Robert Y. Lewis 
The Marsh Law Firm PLLC 
EFTA00022643

Ti 
NATIONA1 
CRIME VIC I IM 
BAR ASSOCIATION 
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this message and any attachment is confidential and may be 
subject to the attorney-client privilege, or otherwise protected from disclosure by applicable law. Any disclosure, distribution, 
copying, or use of the information contained in this message or any attachment by anyone other than the intended recipient, 
regardless of address or routing, is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please telephone or email the 
sender and delete this message and any attachment from your system. 
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this message and any attachment is confidential and 
may be subject to the attorney-client privilege, or otherwise protected from disclosure by applicable law. Any 
disclosure, distribution, copying, or use of the information contained in this message or any attachment by 
anyone other than the intended recipient, regardless of address or routing, is strictly prohibited. If you are not 
the intended recipient, please telephone or email the sender and delete this message and any attachment from 
your system. 
IF YOU ARE NOT A CLIENT: This material is general information of an educational nature and is not legal 
advice. This communication does not establish or constitute the retention of Marsh Law Finn PLLC for the 
provision of legal services, unless explicitly so stated herein. Any attached items, including the content of this e-
mail, are offered "as is" with no guarantee as to their accuracy, timeliness, or completeness. 
EFTA00022644
